content: this legal text summarizes a court case involving two parties referred to as gg and gc regarding the division of property the court determines that za died without a will and orders the dissolution of the community property inheritance gg is declared the sole owner of a property in rome while gc is ordered to pay gg for their share of another property gg sues gc for the division of the estate and payment of occupation indemnity gc contests the obligation to pay indemnity and requests repayment for expenses related to the property the courtappointed expert divides the real estate and determines that gg and gc are equal coowners of the properties gc is ordered to pay gg for occupation indemnity and gg is ordered to repay gc for expenses the court also determines the rental value of the properties and orders gc to pay gg for the theoretical rent finally the court balances the debts and credits between the parties and determines that gc must pay gg a specific amount both parties are responsible for their share of the court costs the court declares that za died without a will and orders the division of the properties accordingly gc is also ordered to pay gg a specific sum of money the court orders the execution of the judgment and states that the costs of the proceedings will be compensated by both parties the courtappointed experts report will be paid equally by gg and gc these decisions were made on february 7 2014
